welcome.title: Welcome to TrainTrackr!
welcome.text: We're excited to have you here. Let’s set up a few things to personalize your experience and help you get the most out of TrainTrackr.

gender.title: What's your gender?
gender.text: This helps us fine-tune your experience. No worries — your info stays private and safe with us.

dob.title: When's your birthday?
dob.text: This helps us fine-tune your experience. No worries — your info stays private and safe with us.

units.title: Choose your preferred units
units.text: This helps us fine-tune your experience. No worries — your info stays private and safe with us.

height.title: What's your height?
height.text: This helps us fine-tune your experience. No worries — your info stays private and safe with us.

weight.title: What's your weight?
weight.text: This helps us fine-tune your experience. No worries — your info stays private and safe with us.

tdee.title: What's your TDEE?
tdee.text: This helps us fine-tune your experience. No worries — your info stays private and safe with us.
tdee.tooltip: TDEE (Total Daily Energy Expenditure) is the estimated number of calories you burn each day through basic bodily functions, daily activities, and exercise. It represents the amount you'd need to eat to maintain your current weight aka maintenance calories.
tdee.calcBtn: I'm not sure, calculate it for me
tdee.calcTdeeBtnTooltip: TDEE will be calculated based on the data you provided in previous steps.

letsGo.title: You're all set!
letsGo.text: This helps us fine-tune your experience. No worries — your info stays private and safe with us.

error.title: Error
error.text: Something went wrong getting your workout. Try refreshing the page.

noActiveMeso.title: You don't have an active mesocycle
noActiveMeso.text: Activate one on the <myMesocyclesLink>My Mesocycles</myMesocyclesLink> page or create a new one on the <newMesocycleLink>New Mesocycle</newMesocycleLink> page.

mesoCompleted.title: Mesocycle completed
mesoCompleted.text: You have completed this mesocycle! You can create a new one on the <newMesocycleLink>New Mesocycle</newMesocycleLink> page or activate an existing one on the <myMesocyclesLink>My Mesocycles</myMesocyclesLink> page.

error.title: No mesocycles
error.text: You have not yet created any mesocycles. Create one on the <newMesoLink>New Mesocycle</newMesoLink> page.

NUTRITION.name: Name
NUTRITION.portionsTooltip: Add different portion sizes to make tracking easier. For example, you can add a 'slice' or 'tablespoon' portion for your food item and specify how many grams the portion weighs.
NUTRITION.addWeightTooltip: For best accuracy, weigh yourself once a day at the same time, ideally in the morning after waking up.

completeWorkout.error: Something went wrong. Couldn’t save your workout.

createMeso.error: Something went wrong. Couldn’t save your mesocycle.

deleteMeso.error: Something went wrong. Couldn’t delete your mesocycle.

activateMeso.error: Something went wrong. Couldn’t activate your mesocycle.

editMeso.error: Something went wrong. Couldn’t edit your mesocycle.

createNutrition.error: Something went wrong. Couldn’t save your nutrition.

updateNutrition.error: Something went wrong. Couldn’t edit your entry.

deleteNutrition.error: Something went wrong. Couldn’t delete your nutrition.

createFoodItem.error: Something went wrong. Couldn’t create your entry.

updateFoodItem.error: Something went wrong. Couldn’t edit your entry.

deleteLog.error: Something went wrong. Couldn’t edit your log.
